title: Soft Line Break in Photoshop CS3
content:
It used to be shift+enter. What happened?

 [‹ Trends in Web Typography](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202184337/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36597 "Go to previous forum topic") [Straightjacket urgently needed! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202184337/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36879 "Go to next forum topic")
author: koleslaw

comments.content: Try the enter key on both the numeric keypad and the regular keypad. Both can be coded differently, and are in Adobe software, I think.
Nope, shift+enter on numeric keypad just exits the text box.
